TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RandomNumberGenerator extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class RandomNumberGenerator Implements IDisposable
public ref class RandomNumberGenerator abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示抽象類別 (Abstract Class)，密碼編譯亂數產生器的所有實作 (Implementation) 從它衍生。

span.span: Represents the abstract class from which all implementations of cryptographic random number generators derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密碼編譯亂數產生器建立密碼編譯強式隨機值。Cryptographic random number generators create cryptographically strong random values. 若要建立隨機號碼產生器，呼叫@System.Security.Cryptography.RandomNumberGenerator.Create方法。To create a random number generator, call the @System.Security.Cryptography.RandomNumberGenerator.Create method. 這是透過呼叫衍生類別的建構函式的慣用@System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider，這並不適用於所有平台。This is prefered over calling the constructor of the derived class @System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider, which is not available on all platforms.

protected: RandomNumberGenerator();

summary.span: 初始化 的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法建立抽象類別的執行個體。You cannot create an instance of an abstract class. 應用程式程式碼會建立衍生類別的新執行個體。Application code will create a new instance of a derived class. 密碼編譯亂數產生器的實作，使用 衍生的類別。For an implementation of a cryptographic random number generator, use the derived class .

summary.span: 建立密碼編譯亂數產生器之實作的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of an implementation of a cryptographic random number generator.

summary.span: 建立預設之密碼編譯亂數產生器實作的執行個體，此產生器可以用來產生隨機資料。

span.span: Creates an instance of the default implementation of a cryptographic random number generator that can be used to generate random data.

returns.span: 密碼編譯亂數產生器的新執行個體。

span.span: A new instance of a cryptographic random number generator.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將目前 類別的執行個體使用的 Unmanaged 資源釋出。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, releases the unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the class.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將目前 類別的執行個體所使用的所有資源全部釋出。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 在位元組陣列中填入在密碼編譯方面的強式隨機值序列。

span.span: Fills an array of bytes with a cryptographically strong random sequence of values.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將在密碼編譯方面強式的隨機值序列填入位元組陣列。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, fills an array of bytes with a cryptographically strong random sequence of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位元組陣列的長度會決定要產生隨機位元組數目。The length of the byte array determines how many random bytes are produced. ## Examples 下列範例會建立隨機序列 100 個位元組，並將其儲存在`random`。The following example creates a random sequence 100 bytes long and stores it in `random`. [!code-cpp[Classic RandomNumberGenerator.GetBytes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic RandomNumberGenerator.GetBytes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RandomNumberGenerator.GetBytes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic RandomNumberGenerator.GetBytes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RandomNumberGenerator.GetBytes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic RandomNumberGenerator.GetBytes Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
